quotes.quote: Appearances are a glimpse of the unseen.
Appearance blinds, whereas words reveal.
Appearances do not deceive if there are enough of them.
The fear of appearances is the first symptom of impotence.
Your appearance can be a weapon. As powerful as any knife or gun.
Appearance is something absolute, but reality is not that way - everything is interdependent, not absolute.
It is only in appearance that time is a river. It is rather a vast landscape and it is the eye of the beholder that moves.
Appearances can be deceiving, but the true colours of your soul remain.
If your appearance is all people see, they have no respect for your mind.
Outward appearance is nothing to Him if it is not an expression of the inner.
The appearance of the law must be upheld - especially when it's being broken.
Keeping up the appearance of having all your marbles is hard work, but important.
All appearances are real and negatio; sophistical: All reality must be sensation.
Your external appearance can be great, but your stunning beauty beams from within.
You cannot judge by outward appearances; the soul is only transparent to its Maker.
An appearance of delicacy is inseparable from sweetness and gentleness of character.
Appearance should never attain reality, And if nature conquers, then must art retire.
It's not the appearance that binds you, it's the attachment to the appearance that binds you.
If you judge after appearances, you will continue to be enslaved by the evidence of your senses.
Our appearance belongs to others, we live in the darkness of the body-part of all darkness but felt.
The appearance of a single great genius is more than equivalent to the birth of a hundred mediocrities
It is not your outward appearance that you should beautify, but your soul, adorning it with good works.
When appearance and reality coincide, philosophy and literary criticism find themselves with nothing to say.
Appearances are nothing.... And first of all they should not be feared, they are only dangerous to the weak.
If appearances are deceitful, then they do not deserve any confidence when they assert what appears to them to be true.
The appearances of goodness and merit often meet with a greater reward from the world than goodness and merit themselves.
In avoiding the appearance of evil, I am not sure but I have sometimes unnecessarily deprived myself and others of innocent enjoyments.
Appearances are deceiving.
Appearance rules the world.
Appearance is a type of power.
First appearance deceives many.
Appearance is valued too much in our society.
Appearances have very little to do with happiness.
The appearance doesn't matter as much as the content.
The sudden appearance of mushrooms after a summer rain is one of the more impressive spectacles of the plant world.
Neglect of appearance becomes men.
Risking the appearance of weakness takes strength. And the market knows it.
The appearance of things to the mind is the standard of every action to man.
An appearance of delicacy, and even fragility, is almost essential to beauty.
The appearance of religion only on Sunday proves that it is only an appearance.
A respectable appearance is sufficient to make people more interested in your soul.
We try to create this interesting appearance to make ourselves feel better about ourselves.
The appearance of the other in the world corresponds therefore to a congealed sliding of the whole universe.
The appearance is the allusion of abstraction when in fact I am in control of every aspect of that symmetry.
Appearance matters a great deal because you can often tell a lot about people by looking at how they present themselves.
Appearances are significant, and never more than in politics. You can always sway the crowd, provided you have a good story.
Most of the appearance of mirth in the world is not mirth, it is art. The wounded spirit is not seen, but walks under a disguise.

Our outward appearance is a reflection of what we are on the inside. Our lives reflect that for which we seek. And if with all our hearts we truly seek to know the Savior and to be more like Him, we shall be, for He is our divine, eternal Brother.
What lies behind appearance is usually another appearance.
Augmenting your appearance so drastically that it elicits a reaction from literally every acquaintance you greet is a sea change.
